Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.databases

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.databases.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager
extends Object
The Database Manager is a singleton class that manages what database steps should use for connection.
